sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <ProductComp class="col-4" :card="product" v-for="(product, index) in visibleProducts" :key="index"/>
    </v-row>
    <button v-if="showMoreButton" @click="showMore">نمایش بیشتر</button>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import ProductComp from "@/components/ProductComp.vue";

export default {
  name: "TestView",
  components: {ProductComp},
  data() {
    return {
      visibleProductCount: 9,
    };
  },
  computed: {
    products() {
      return this.$store.state.products;
    },
    visibleProducts() {
      return this.products.slice(0, this.visibleProductCount);
    },
    showMoreButton() {
      return this.visibleProductCount < this.products.length;
    },
  },
  methods: {
    showMore() {
      this.visibleProductCount += 10;
    },
  },
};
</script>
